flavor_text: It converts sun light into energy. In the darknessafter sunset it closes its petals and becomes still.
In the daytime it rushes about in a hectic manner butit comes to a com plete stop when the sun sets.
As the hot season approaches the petals on thisPokemon's face become more vivid and lively.
